conclusion: Understand the relationship between position-time graph and velocity-time graph.
The graph shows x/t versus t.
The slope of the graph is given by d/dt(x/t).
The slope of the graph is the rate of change of x/t with respect to t.
The slope is constant and positive, tangent of the angle with time axis.
The slope is the change in x/t divided by the change in t.
The line passes through the points (0, 10) and (2, 20).
The slope of x/t versus t graph is equal to velocity v.
The speed of the car at the end of the 2nd second is 5 m/s.
